__e: But you know, a souvenir to send to the folks back home.
I was hoping you might have a keepsake for me... something which will always remind me of you.
- Just a gift to tide you over till tomorrow.
Say Doc, there is one thing I'd like as a souvenir of the trip.
You can take that wherever you go... to always remember your trip to the United States.
You've always said it was a keepsake from your mother.
Then you're gone and I have the memories of a single night.
I wonder if you could give us your best recollection of who was at that meeting-
But we'll always have whatever happened. Which was nothing.
Yes, that's right, but it isn't the car accident, or even the memory of the baby that stops me.
AH YES, A SOUVENIR OF MY YOUNGER YEARS, WHEN I WAS STILL A LAD.
Although I can't get the memory of that evening out of my mind!
Tell me the first token, That passed between you and me.
Oh, Mamie, you won't be here tonight when I come back to get my things and I want to give you a little remembrance I made for you
Probably the only reminder she has of her former world:
What to bring from Montenegro as a souvenir and as a gift to family and friends? We'll show you! A detailed shopping list in this article.
The third is remembrance, and... the fourth is practice.
And me and mom... We had the here and now... And we had each other.
